title: Sports Illustrated "Swimsuit 2014" logo
content:
Hello friends,  
what font is used for "Swimsuit 2014" logo and model logos ?  
 [http://swimsuit.si.com/swimsuit/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040903/http:/swimsuit.si.com/swimsuit/ "http://swimsuit.si.com/swimsuit/")  
Beautiful website isn't it ? ;)  
Is it a custom lettering ?

Thx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040903im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_4443.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040903/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_59.png) | 28.59 KB |
author: wonderfulgreg

comments.content:
Can't find anything on it part of these [4 unsolved discussions at WTF Forum](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040903/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/?q=sports+illustrated) and [this post](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040903/http:/www.quora.com/Typeface-Identification/What-font-is-Sports-Illustrated-using-on-their-2014-Swimsuit-Issue) at Quora (answered by font expert [Stephen Coles](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040903/http:/fontsinuse.com/) as possibly custom lettering).  
To me, considering this lettering is declined for each model, tt might be a font... or not ;D  
Reminds me of the work of [Manuel Eduardo Corradine](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040903/http:/www.myfonts.com/person/Manuel_Eduardo_Corradine) and [Maximiliano Sproviero](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040903/http:/www.myfonts.com/person/Maximiliano_Sproviero) (probably because of the Inline/Plain mix like his [Brand](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040903/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/argentina-lian-types/brand)).  
Some very loosely alternatives: [Olidia](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040903/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/olidia), [Almibar](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040903/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/almibar)
